title: Jeremiah Johnson
plot: A mountain man who wishes to live the life of a hermit becomes the unwilling object of a long vendetta by the Crow tribe and proves to be a match for their warriors in single combat on the early frontier.

title: I Don't Feel at Home in This World Anymore.
plot: When a depressed woman is burgled, she finds a new sense of purpose by tracking down the thieves alongside her obnoxious neighbour. But they soon find themselves dangerously out of their depth against a pack of degenerate criminals.

title: Sesame Street
plot: On a special inner city street, the inhabitants, human and muppet, teach preschool subjects with comedy, cartoons, games, and songs.

title: Triplets
plot: Julius and Vincent Benedict discover they have a third sibling.

title: Enough Said
plot: A divorced woman who decides to pursue the man she's interested in learns he's her new friend's ex-husband.

title: Malignant
plot: Original horror thriller from director James Wan.

title: The Break
plot: Crime series kick-started by the finding on a young man's body.

title: Secondhand Lions
plot: A coming-of-age story about a shy, young boy sent by his irresponsible mother to spend the summer with his wealthy, eccentric uncles in Texas.

title: Valley Girl
plot: Julie, a girl from the valley, meets Randy, a punk from the city. They are from different worlds and find love. Somehow they need to stay together in spite of her trendy, shallow friends.

title: Leonardo
plot: The series recounts Leonardo da Vinci's extraordinary life through the works that made him famous, through the stories hidden within those works, revealing little by little the inner torment of a man obsessed with attaining perfection.

title: Rise of Empires: Ottoman
plot: Ottoman Sultan Mehmed II wages an epic campaign to take the Byzantine capital of Constantinople and shapes the course of history for centuries.

title: Daddy's Home
plot: Brad Whitaker is a radio host trying to get his stepchildren to love him and call him Dad. But his plans turn upside down when their biological father, Dusty Mayron, returns.

title: Zac and Mia
plot: Based on the novel by A.J. Betts about two teens battling cancer in the same hospital.

title: L.A. Law
plot: The lives and work of the staff of a major Los Angeles law firm.

title: Chucky
plot: After a vintage Chucky doll turns up at a suburban yard sale, an idyllic American town is thrown into chaos as a series of horrifying murders begin to expose the town's hypocrisies and secrets.

title: Crank
plot: Professional assassin Chev Chelios learns his rival has injected him with a poison that will kill him if his heart rate drops.

title: The Owl House
plot: Accidentally sent to the world of the Boiling Isles before a trip to summer camp, a teenage human named Luz longs to become a witch, with the rebellious Eda and pint-sized demon King at her aid.

title: Naked
plot: Parallel tales of two sexually obsessed men, one hurting and annoying women physically and mentally, one wandering around the city talking to strangers and experiencing dimensions of life.

title: How the Grinch Stole Christmas
plot: On the outskirts of Whoville lives a green, revenge-seeking Grinch who plans to ruin Christmas for all of the citizens of the town.

title: Batman: Soul of the Dragon
plot: In the 1970s, a missing teacher of martial arts is the subject of a quest by his devoted and brilliant but distant students, who include Batman.

title: Rolling Thunder
plot: A returning war veteran loses his family to a violent home invasion and decides to seek and retaliate against those responsible.

title: Nathan for You
plot: Nathan Fielder uses his business degree and life experiences to help real small businesses turn a profit. But because of his unorthodox approach, Nathan's genuine efforts to do good often draw real people into an experience far beyond what they signed up for.

title: The Pelican Brief
plot: A law student uncovers a conspiracy, putting herself and others in danger.

title: Soul Surfer
plot: Teenage surfer Bethany Hamilton overcomes the odds and her own fears of returning to the water after losing her left arm in a shark attack.

title: The Hangover Part III
plot: When one of their own is kidnapped by an angry gangster, the Wolf Pack must track down Mr. Chow, who has escaped from prison and is on the run.

title: The Benchwarmers
plot: A trio of guys try and make up for missed opportunities in childhood by forming a three-player baseball team to compete against standard children's Little League squads.

title: Beauty and the Beast
plot: The adventures and romance of a sensitive and cultured lion-man and a crusading assistant district attorney in Manhattan, New York City.

title: World on Fire
plot: WWII drama centered on the lives of ordinary people affected by the war.

title: 30 Days of Night
plot: After an Alaskan town is plunged into darkness for a month, it is attacked by a bloodthirsty gang of vampires.

title: Bridge and Tunnel
plot: This dramedy series set in 1980 revolves around a group of recent college grads setting out to pursue their dreams in Manhattan while still clinging to the familiarity of their working-class Long Island home town.

title: Never Been Kissed
plot: A newspaper reporter enrolls in high school as part of research for a story.

title: Ludo
plot: From a resurfaced sex tape to a rogue suitcase of money, four wildly different stories overlap at the whims of fate, chance and one eccentric criminal.

title: The I-Land
plot: When ten people wake up on a treacherous island with no memory of who they are and how they got there, they set off on a trek to try to get back home, only to discover the world is not as it seems.

title: Romance
plot: Frustrated by the lack of intimacy in her relationship, a young schoolteacher goes through a series of intimidating and often violent sexual partners.

title: The Man in the Iron Mask
plot: The cruel King Louis XIV of France has a secret twin brother whom he keeps imprisoned. Can the twin be substituted for the real king?

title: Minions: The Rise of Gru
plot: The untold story of one twelve-year-old's dream to become the world's greatest supervillain.

title: No Activity
plot: Two low-level cops who have spent too much time in a car; two criminals who are kept in the dark; two dispatch workers who haven't really clicked; and two Mexican tunnelers who are in a small space considering they've only just met.

title: Peter Pan
plot: Wendy and her brothers are whisked away to the magical world of Neverland with the hero of their stories, Peter Pan.

title: Masterminds
plot: A guard at an armored car company in the Southern U.S. organizes one of the biggest bank heists in American history. Based on the October 1997 Loomis Fargo robbery.

title: Lost in Space
plot: The Robinson family was going into space to fight for a chance for humanity. Now they are fighting to live long enough to find a way home.

title: Due Date
plot: High-strung father-to-be Peter Highman is forced to hitch a ride with aspiring actor Ethan Tremblay on a road trip in order to make it to his child's birth on time.

title: Snatch
plot: A group of up-and-coming hustlers who stumble upon a truck-load of stolen gold bullion are suddenly thrust into the high-stakes world of organized crime.

title: Flower
plot: A sexually curious teen forms an unorthodox kinship with her mentally unstable stepbrother.

title: Light in the Piazza
plot: Upper class Americans Noel and Meg Johnson have a twenty-six year old daughter named Clara Johnson. Clara suffered a head injury as a child which resulted in her being mentally disabled. ...                 See full summary  »

title: A Lot Like Love
plot: Unacquainted Emily and Oliver join the mile-high club together on the way from LAX to NYC--end of story. Except that they keep meeting constantly over the next seven years..

title: Blast from the Past
plot: A naive man comes out into the world after spending 35 years in a nuclear fallout shelter.

title: Edge of Darkness
plot: As homicide detective Thomas Craven investigates the murder of his activist daughter, he uncovers a corporate cover-up and government conspiracy that attracts an agent tasked with cleaning up the evidence.

title: Vampyres
plot: Two mysterious women lure various passers-by to their rural mansion in the English countryside and hold them captive in order to feed on them to satisfy their insatiable thirst for blood.

title: The Longest Ride
plot: The lives of a young couple intertwine with a much older man, as he reflects back on a past love.

title: Parasyte: The Maxim
plot: 17-year-old Shinichi Izumi is partially infected by a Parasyte; monsters that butcher and consume humans. He must learn to co-exist with the creature if he is to survive both the life of a Parasyte and human, as part monster, part person.

title: Pandora
plot: Set in the year 2199, a young woman who has lost everything finds a new life at Earth's Space Training Academy where she learns to defend the galaxy from intergalactic threats.

title: 90 Day Fiancé
plot: Using a unique 90-day engagement visa, four women travel to the US to live with their American fiancés for the first time. Each couple has 90 days to wed before the visas expire and the women must return home.

title: Velvet Buzzsaw
plot: A satire set in the contemporary art world scene of Los Angeles, where big money artists and mega-collectors pay a high price when art collides with commerce.

title: Texas Chainsaw
plot: A young woman travels to Texas to collect an inheritance; little does she know that an encounter with a chainsaw-wielding killer is part of the reward.

title: The Full Monty
plot: Six unemployed steel workers form a male striptease act. The women cheer them on to go for "the full monty" - total nudity.

title: Nude Interviews
plot: In each episode, a Nude-Muse model is interviewed while completely nude.

title: Like a Boss
plot: Two friends with very different ideals start a beauty company together. One is more practical while the other wants to earn her fortune and live a lavish lifestyle.

title: Nenjam Marappathillai
plot: A god-fearing young woman who takes up the job of a caretaker in a rich household tries to take revenge on her lustful employer.

title: Heartbreak High
plot: The series based on the lives of a group of students who attend the fictional Hartley High School in Sydney. Praised for its willingness to tackle gritty issues, from drugs to romance to ...                 See full summary  »

title: Hansel & Gretel: Witch Hunters
plot: Brother-sister duo Hansel and Gretel are professional witch hunters who help innocent villagers. But they soon stumble upon a case that could hold the key to their past.

title: Fantastic 4: Rise of the Silver Surfer
plot: The Fantastic Four learn that they aren't the only super-powered beings in the universe when they square off against the powerful Silver Surfer and the planet-eating Galactus.

title: Ordinary People
plot: The accidental death of the older son of an affluent family deeply strains the relationships among the bitter mother, the good-natured father, and the guilt-ridden younger son.

title: Killjoys
plot: In the Quad, a planetary system on the brink of a bloody interplanetary class war, a fun loving trio of bounty hunters attempt to remain impartial as they chase deadly warrants.

title: Alice
plot: The story of detective Park Jin Gyeom who comes to know about the existence of time travelers while investigating a mysterious murder case.

title: Deadly Class
plot: A coming-of-age story set against the backdrop of late 1980s counterculture, which follows a disillusioned teen recruited into a storied high school for assassins.

title: The Manchurian Candidate
plot: In the midst of the Gulf War, soldiers are kidnapped and brainwashed for sinister purposes.

title: Pelé
plot: Looks back at the extraordinary 12-year period in which Pelé, the only man to win three World Cup titles, went from young superstar in 1958 to national hero in 1970; a radical yet turbulent era in Brazil’s history.

title: Cleopatra
plot: Queen Cleopatra VII of Egypt experiences both triumph and tragedy as she attempts to resist the imperial ambitions of Rome.

title: Naked Fear
plot: Diana arrives in a town to start a new job. She's threatened into working as an exotic dancer. She's later kidnapped and let loose naked in the wilderness as prey for the psycho hunter, like many women before her. Will she survive?

title: The Last House on the Left
plot: Two teenage girls heading to a rock concert for one's birthday try to score marijuana in the city, where they are kidnapped and brutalized by a gang of psychotic convicts.

title: Rope
plot: Two men attempt to prove they committed the perfect crime by hosting a dinner party after strangling their former classmate to death.

title: The Mechanic
plot: An elite hitman teaches his trade to an apprentice who has a connection to one of his previous victims.

title: The Watch
plot: Four men who form a neighborhood watch group as a way to get out of their day-to-day family routines find themselves defending the Earth from an alien invasion.

title: Final Analysis
plot: A psychiatrist becomes romantically involved with the sister of one of his patients, but the influence of her controlling gangster husband threatens to destroy them both.

title: Hold the Dark
plot: After the deaths of three children suspected to be killed by wolves, writer Russell Core is hired by the mother of a missing six-year-old boy to track down and locate her son in the Alaskan wilderness.

title: Brawl in Cell Block 99
plot: A former boxer-turned-drug runner lands in a prison battleground after a deal gets deadly.

title: Marrowbone
plot: A young man and his three younger siblings, who have kept secret the death of their beloved mother in order to remain together, are plagued by a sinister presence in the sprawling manor in which they live.

title: Kill the Messenger
plot: Journalist Gary Webb, California 1996, started investigating CIA's role in the 1980s in getting crack cocaine to the black part of LA to get money and weapons to the Contras/freedom fighters in Nicaragua.

title: The Little Drummer Girl
plot: A Palestinian assassin is targeting prominent Israelis. An English actress is recruited by the Israelis to infiltrate the assassin's terrorist cell. This will require all of her acting talents and put her at considerable risk.

title: The Adventures of Robin Hood
plot: When Prince John and the Norman Lords begin oppressing the Saxon masses in King Richard's absence, a Saxon lord fights back as the outlaw leader of a rebel guerrilla army.

title: Body of Lies
plot: A CIA agent on the ground in Jordan hunts down a powerful terrorist leader while being caught between the unclear intentions of his American supervisors and Jordan Intelligence.

title: High Ground
plot: In a bid to save the last of his family, Gutjuk, a young Aboriginal man, teams up with ex-soldier Travis to track down Baywara, the most dangerous warrior in the Territory, his uncle.

title: God of War
plot: After wiping out the gods of Mount Olympus, Kratos moves on to the frigid lands of Scandinavia, where he and his son must embark on an odyssey across a dangerous world of gods and monsters.

title: Scary Movie V
plot: A couple begin to experience some unusual activity after bringing their lost nieces and nephew home. With the help of home-surveillance cameras, they learn they're being stalked by a nefarious demon.

title: Days of Thunder
plot: A young hot-shot stock car driver gets his chance to compete at the top level.

title: For a Few Dollars More
plot: Two bounty hunters with the same intentions team up to track down a Western outlaw.

title: The Signal
plot: On a road trip, Nic and two friends are drawn to an isolated area by a computer genius. When everything suddenly goes dark, Nic regains consciousness - only to find himself in a waking nightmare.

title: Your Highness
plot: When Prince Fabious's bride is kidnapped, he goes on a quest to rescue her... accompanied by his lazy useless brother Thadeous.

title: Underworld: Awakening
plot: When human forces discover the existence of the Vampire and Lycan clans, a war to eradicate both species commences. The vampire warrior Selene leads the battle against humankind.

title: Juliet, Naked
plot: Juliet, Naked is the story of Annie (the long-suffering girlfriend of Duncan) and her unlikely transatlantic romance with once revered, now faded, singer-songwriter, Tucker Crowe, who also happens to be the subject of Duncan's musical obsession.

title: Shark Tale
plot: When a son of a gangster shark boss is accidentally killed while on the hunt, his would-be prey and his vegetarian brother decide to use the incident to their own advantage.

title: Red Dawn
plot: It is the dawn of World War III. In mid-western America, a group of teenagers band together to defend their town, and their country, from invading Soviet forces.

title: Alice Through the Looking Glass
plot: Alice returns to the whimsical world of Wonderland and travels back in time to help the Mad Hatter.

title: Prisoners of the Ghostland
plot: A notorious criminal must break an evil curse in order to rescue an abducted girl who has mysteriously disappeared.

title: Make It or Break It
plot: Follows a group of teen Olympic hopefuls as they train and prepare for their day in the spotlight.

title: The Indian Fighter
plot: A scout leading a wagon train through hostile Indian country unwittingly gets involved with a Sioux chief's daughter.

title: The Burnt Orange Heresy
plot: Hired to steal a rare painting from one of the most enigmatic painters of all time, an ambitious art dealer becomes consumed by his own greed and insecurity as the operation spins out of control.

title: The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out of Water
plot: When a diabolical pirate above the sea steals the secret Krabby Patty formula, SpongeBob and his nemesis Plankton must team up in order to get it back.

title: Terminal
plot: A film noir taking place in a train terminal at night. Add 2 male assassins, female assassin, waitress, teacher, janitor and crime boss. Add revenge. Who says mystery is a lost art?

title: Dreamcatcher
plot: Friends on a camping trip discover that the town they're vacationing in is being plagued in an unusual fashion by parasitic aliens from outer space.

title: The Good Dinosaur
plot: In a world where dinosaurs and humans live side-by-side, an Apatosaurus named Arlo makes an unlikely human friend.

title: Seven Seconds
plot: Tensions run high between African American citizens and Caucasian cops in Jersey City when a teenage African American boy is critically injured by a cop.

title: Superhero Movie
plot: Orphaned high school student Rick Riker is bitten by a radioactive dragonfly, develops super powers (except for the ability to fly), and becomes a hero.

title: Tucker and Dale vs Evil
plot: Affable hillbillies Tucker and Dale are on vacation at their dilapidated mountain cabin when they are mistaken for murderers by a group of preppy college students.

title: The Comey Rule
plot: Jeff Daniels and Brendan Gleeson star as former FBI Dir. James Comey and President Donald J. Trump in this limited series of the story of two powerful men, whose strikingly different ethics and loyalties put them on a collision course.

title: Night of the Comet
plot: A comet wipes out most of life on Earth, leaving two Valley Girls fighting against cannibal zombies and a sinister group of scientists.

title: Carriers
plot: As a lethal virus spreads globally, four friends seek a reputed plague-free haven. But while avoiding the infected, the travelers turn on one another.

title: Ackley Bridge
plot: The merging of two schools causes plenty of problems for headmistress Mandy who has to deal with explosive fall-outs and problem pupils.

title: Deutschland 86
plot: Abandoned by Moscow and desperate for cash, the East German leadership pushes their secret operatives to experiment with global capitalism and save their sinking socialist ship. Long ...                 See full summary  »

title: Roman J. Israel, Esq.
plot: Roman J. Israel, Esq., a driven, idealistic defense attorney, finds himself in a tumultuous series of events that lead to a crisis and the necessity for extreme action.

title: Frailty
plot: A mysterious man arrives at the offices of an FBI agent and recounts his childhood: how his religious fanatic father received visions telling him to destroy people who were in fact "demons."

title: Walkabout
plot: Two city-bred siblings are stranded in the Australian Outback, where they learn to survive with the aid of an Aboriginal boy on his "walkabout": a ritual separation from his tribe.

title: Shigatsu wa kimi no uso
plot: A piano prodigy who lost his ability to play after suffering a traumatic event in his childhood is forced back into the spotlight by an eccentric girl with a secret of her own.

title: Father of the Bride
plot: With his oldest daughter's wedding approaching, a father finds himself reluctant to let go.

title: To Die For
plot: A beautiful but naïve aspiring television personality films a documentary on teenagers with a darker ulterior motive.

title: Child's Play
plot: A single mother gives her son a much sought-after doll for his birthday, only to discover that it is possessed by the soul of a serial killer.

title: Drop Dead Diva
plot: A vapid aspiring model killed in a car crash gets brought back to life as an intelligent, overweight lawyer, hoping to find the meaning of inner beauty.

title: Amar
plot: Laura and Carlos love each other as if every day was the last, and perhaps that first love intensity is what will tear them apart a year later.

title: Wild Child
plot: A rebellious Malibu princess is shipped off to a strict English boarding school by her father.

title: Ghost Rider: Spirit of Vengeance
plot: Johnny Blaze, tortured by the Ghost Rider's curse, gets a chance of redemption through protecting the Devil's son, whose father is pursuing him.

title: In Secret
plot: Thérèse grows up with her aunt and cousin. Around 1860 the aunt decides they move to Paris and that her son and Thérèse get married. The joy- and loveless life changes when her husband brings a friend home. The affair turns ugly for all.

title: Dude, Where's My Car?
plot: Two potheads wake up after a night of partying and cannot remember where they parked their car.

title: Licence to Kill
plot: After capturing a drug lord, Felix Leiter is left for dead and his wife is murdered. James Bond goes rogue and seeks vengeance on those responsible, as he infiltrates an organisation posing as a hitman.

title: The Hater
plot: A young man searches for purpose in a net of hatred and violence that he tries to control.

title: Grand Army
plot: The drama series tells the story of five high school students as they struggle with sexual, racial and economic politics and fight to succeed and become somebody.

title: Veneno
plot: A biographical story of  La Veneno , transgender icon and TV personality, and those who surrounded her.

title: Gangster Squad
plot: It's 1949 Los Angeles, the city is run by gangsters and a malicious mobster, Mickey Cohen. Determined to end the corruption, John O'Mara assembles a team of cops, ready to take down the ruthless leader and restore peace to the city.

title: Homicide: Life on the Street
plot: Life on the Street is an American police procedural television series chronicling the work of a fictional version of the Baltimore Police Department's Homicide Unit.

title: Lucy in the Sky
plot: Astronaut Lucy Cola returns to Earth after a transcendent experience during a mission to space, and begins to lose touch with reality in a world that now seems too small.

title: The Purge: Anarchy
plot: Three groups of people intertwine and are left stranded in the streets on Purge Night, trying to survive the chaos and violence that occurs.

title: Elena Undone
plot: Fate brings two diversely different women together, and sets them on a collision course that will shatter their preconceived notions about love, life and the power of one's soul.

title: Transporter 2
plot: Transporter Frank Martin, surfaces in Miami, Florida and is implicated in the kidnapping of the young son of a powerful USA official.

title: Fantasy Flirt
plot: A high energy mix of the newest and sexiest girls to pose for Playboy. Models share their turn-ons, fantasies and secret desires while taking it all off for the cameras.

title: A Week Away
plot: Nowhere left to go, Will Hawkins finds himself at camp for the first time. His instinct is to run, but he finds a friend, a father figure and even a girl who awakens his heart. Most of all, he finally finds a home.

title: The Lucky One
plot: A Marine travels to Louisiana after serving three tours in Iraq and searches for the unknown woman he believes was his good luck charm during the war.

title: The Lego Batman Movie
plot: A cooler-than-ever Bruce Wayne must deal with the usual suspects as they plan to rule Gotham City, while discovering that he has accidentally adopted a teenage orphan who wishes to become his sidekick.

title: Me, Myself & Irene
plot: A nice-guy cop with Dissociative Identity Disorder must protect a woman on the run from a corrupt ex-boyfriend and his associates.

title: Catch-22
plot: Limited series adaptation of the classic Joseph Heller novel. Follows Captain John Yossarian and airmen in World War II.

title: Berlin Syndrome
plot: A passionate holiday romance leads to an obsessive relationship, when an Australian photojournalist wakes one morning in a Berlin apartment and is unable to leave.

title: Scare Me
plot: During a power outage, two strangers tell scary stories. The more Fred and Fanny commit to their tales, the more the stories come to life in their Catskills cabin. The horrors of reality manifest when Fred confronts his ultimate fear.

title: Silent House
plot: A girl is trapped inside her family's lakeside retreat and becomes unable to contact the outside world as supernatural forces haunt the house with mysterious energy and consequences.

title: Kevin Can F**k Himself
plot: A look at the secret life of a sitcom wife.

title: A Sun
plot: A family of four fractures under the weight of unmet expectations, unexpected tragedy, and uncompromising pride.

title: Dark Water
plot: A mother and daughter, still wounded from a bitter custody dispute, hole up in a run-down apartment building, where they are targeted by the ghost of a former resident.

title: My Bloody Valentine
plot: Tom returns to his hometown on the tenth anniversary of the Valentine's night massacre that claimed the lives of 22 people. Instead of a homecoming, Tom finds himself suspected of committing the murders, and it seems like his old flame is the only one that believes he's innocent.

title: The Happytime Murders
plot: When the puppet cast of a '90s children's TV show begin to get murdered one by one, a disgraced LAPD detective-turned-private eye puppet takes on the case.

title: D3: The Mighty Ducks
plot: The unruly team of hockey misfits grows up a bit and receives scholarships to a prestigious prep school, where they take on the snotty varsity team.

title: The Last Starfighter
plot: Video game expert Alex Rogan finds himself transported to another planet after conquering The Last Starfighter video game only to find out it was just a test. He was recruited to join the team of best starfighters to defend their world from the attack.

title: The Carol Burnett Show
plot: Television show featuring skits by Carol Burnett and her comedy troupe.

title: 28 Days
plot: A big-city newspaper columnist is forced to enter a drug and alcohol rehab center after ruining her sister's wedding and crashing a stolen limousine.

title: Corner Gas
plot: The life, or lack thereof, of a proprietor of a gas station, which is the only stop for miles around and a hub of action on the Prairies.

title: Light of My Life
plot: Parent and child journey through the outskirts of society a decade after a pandemic has wiped out half the world's population. As a father struggles to protect his child, their bond, and the character of humanity, is tested.

title: Network
plot: A television network cynically exploits a deranged former anchor's ravings and revelations about the news media for its own profit.

title: Weekend at Bernie's
plot: Two losers try to pretend that their murdered employer is really alive, leading the hitman to attempt to track him down to finish him off.

title: Rawhide
plot: Gil Favor is trail boss of a continuous cattle drive. He is assisted by Rowdy Yates. The crew runs into characters and adventures along the way.

title: Two Guys, a Girl and a Pizza Place
plot: Three twenty-somethings share a Boston apartment and hang around (and work) at a pizza place.

title: Charade
plot: Romance and suspense ensue in Paris as a woman is pursued by several men who want a fortune her murdered husband had stolen. Whom can she trust?

title: Splice
plot: Genetic engineers Clive Nicoli and Elsa Kast hope to achieve fame by successfully splicing together the DNA of different animals to create new hybrid animals for medical use.

title: The Outlaw
plot: Western legends Pat Garrett, Doc Holliday and Billy the Kid are played against each other over the law and the attentions of vivacious country vixen Rio McDonald.

title: Mute
plot: A mute bartender goes up against his city's gangsters in an effort to find out what happened to his missing partner.

title: Underworld: Rise of the Lycans
plot: An origins story centered on the centuries-old feud between the race of aristocratic vampires and their onetime slaves, the Lycans.

title: American Skin
plot: A Marine veteran working as a school janitor tries to mend his relationship with his son after a divorce. When his son is killed by a police officer found innocent without standing trial, he takes matters into his own hands.

title: Don't Trust the B---- in Apartment 23
plot: Chloe is a New York party girl with the morals of a pirate. She causes trouble for her naive small town roommate, June, and Chloe's best friend, James Van Der Beek.

title: Pain and Glory
plot: A film director reflects on the choices he's made in life as the past and present come crashing down around him.

title: Quigley Down Under
plot: Sharpshooter Matt Quigley is hired from Wyoming by an Australian rancher paying a very high price. But when Quigley arrives Down Under, all is not as it seems.

title: Archenemy
plot: Max Fist claims to be a hero from another dimension who fell through time and space to earth, where he has no powers. No one believes his stories except for a local teen named Hamster.

title: Cool Runnings
plot: When a Jamaican sprinter is disqualified from the Olympic Games, he enlists the help of a dishonored coach to start the first Jamaican Bobsled Team.

title: Before Midnight
plot: We meet Jesse and Celine nine years on in Greece. Almost two decades have passed since their first meeting on that train bound for Vienna.

title: Defiance
plot: Life in the city of Defiance, in a near future after the arrival of different alien lifeforms to Earth.

title: CODA
plot: As a CODA (Child of Deaf Adults) Ruby is the only hearing person in her deaf family. When the family's fishing business is threatened, Ruby finds herself torn between pursuing her love of music and her fear of abandoning her parents.

title: Kung Fu Panda 3
plot: Continuing his "legendary adventures of awesomeness", Po must face two hugely epic, but different threats: one supernatural and the other a little closer to home.

title: Bill & Ted's Bogus Journey
plot: A tyrant from the future creates evil android doubles of Bill and Ted and sends them back to eliminate the originals.

title: Christopher Robin
plot: A working-class family man, Christopher Robin, encounters his childhood friend Winnie-the-Pooh, who helps him to rediscover the joys of life.

title: What If
plot: Wallace, who is burned out from a string of failed relationships, forms an instant bond with Chantry, who lives with her longtime boyfriend. Together, they puzzle out what it means if your best friend is also the love of your life.

title: P.S. I Love You
plot: A young widow discovers that her late husband has left her 10 messages intended to help ease her pain and start a new life.

title: The Split
plot: The Defoes, a family of female divorce lawyers, are forced to face their past following the return of their estranged father after a 30 year absence.

title: Brahms: The Boy II
plot: After a family moves into the Heelshire Mansion, their young son soon makes friends with a life-like doll called Brahms.

title: Megan Is Missing
plot: Two teenage girls encounter an Internet child predator.

title: Secret Invasion
plot: Fury and Talos try to stop the Skrulls who have infiltrated the highest spheres of the Marvel Universe.

title: Big Jake
plot: In 1909, when John Fain's gang kidnaps Jacob McCandles' grandson and holds him for ransom, Big Jake sets out to rescue the boy.

title: Turbo
plot: A freak accident might just help an everyday garden snail achieve his biggest dream: winning the Indy 500.

title: 8½
plot: A harried movie director retreats into his memories and fantasies.

title: Suburgatory
plot: Tessa Altman is used to the big city but when her dad moves her away, she has to adapt to her new suburban life in Chatswin.

title: Lord of the Flies
plot: Stranded on an island, a group of schoolboys degenerate into savagery.

title: Abominable
plot: Three teenagers must help a Yeti return to his family while avoiding a wealthy man and a zoologist who want him for their own needs.

title: While You Were Sleeping
plot: A hopelessly romantic Chicago Transit Authority token collector is mistaken for the fiancée of a coma patient.

title: The Man Who Killed Don Quixote
plot: Toby, a disillusioned film director, is pulled into a world of time-jumping fantasy when a Spanish cobbler believes himself to be Sancho Panza. He gradually becomes unable to tell dreams from reality.

title: The Cable Guy
plot: A lonely and mentally disturbed cable guy raised on television just wants a new friend, but his target, a designer, rejects him, with bad consequences.

title: Vision Quest
plot: A high school wrestler in Spokane, Washington has trouble focusing on his training regimen when a beautiful young drifter takes up temporary residence at his home.

title: The Diary of a Teenage Girl
plot: A teen artist living in 1970s San Francisco enters into an affair with her mother's boyfriend.

title: Hotel Desire
plot: A young single mother drops her son of at the bus stop to visit his dad in Paris. After being late for work, she almost gets fired. At the end of her duties she gets into a tricky situation which she handles, with the advice her colleague gave her.

title: 47 Ronin
plot: A band of samurai set out to avenge the death and dishonor of their master at the hands of a ruthless shogun.

title: Wij
plot: Eight teens - four guys and four girls - are the best of friends. One summer, out of boredom they experiment with all manner of new means to entertain themselves. This degenerates into some extreme behaviour and will lead to tragedy.

title: Synecdoche, New York
plot: A theatre director struggles with his work, and the women in his life, as he creates a life-size replica of New York City inside a warehouse as part of his new play.

title: Never Look Away
plot: German artist Kurt Barnert has escaped East Germany and now lives in West Germany, but is tormented by his childhood under the Nazis and the GDR-regime.

title: Paw Patrol: The Movie
plot: Ryder and the pups are called to Adventure City to stop Mayor Humdinger from turning the bustling metropolis into a state of chaos.

title: Freddy vs. Jason
plot: Freddy Krueger and Jason Voorhees return to terrorize the teenage population. Except this time, they're out to get each other, too.

title: The Spirit
plot: Rookie cop Denny Colt returns from the beyond as The Spirit, a hero whose mission is to fight against the bad forces in Central City.

title: Roman Holiday
plot: A bored and sheltered princess escapes her guardians and falls in love with an American newsman in Rome.

title: Star Trek: The Motion Picture
plot: When an alien spacecraft of enormous power is spotted approaching Earth, Admiral James T. Kirk resumes command of the overhauled USS Enterprise in order to intercept it.

title: Rosemary & Thyme
plot: Set amongst the stunning gardens of Europe, Rosemary Boxer and Laura Thyme, two professional gardeners, find themselves drawn into solving mysterious crimes.

title: Brush Strokes
plot: Jacko is a house painter who "appreciates" women. He sees the best in each one of them and they in turn, like him. Will he find true love? Will he settle down as he gets older?

title: Wild Wild West
plot: The two best special agents in the Wild West must save President Grant from the clutches of a diabolical, wheelchair-bound, steampunk-savvy, Confederate scientist bent on revenge for losing the Civil War.

title: Dear Comrades
plot: When the communist government raises food prices in 1962, the rebellious workers from the small industrial town of Novocherkassk go on strike. The massacre which then ensues is seen through the eyes of a devout party activist.

title: Jersey Shore Family Vacation
plot: Past members of the cast of "Jersey Shore" reunite to live together and go on vacation in Miami and other destinations.

title: Roe v. Wade
plot: Dr. Bernard Nathanson and Dr. Mildred Jefferson square off in a national battle in this untold conspiracy that led to the most famous and controversial court case in history.

title: The Life of David Gale
plot: A man against capital punishment is accused of murdering a fellow activist and is sent to death row.

title: Over the Garden Wall
plot: Two brothers find themselves lost in a mysterious land and try to find their way home.

title: The 15:17 to Paris
plot: An attempted terrorist attack on a Paris bound train is prevented by three courageous young Americans. Their friendship was their greatest weapon that saved the lives of those on board.

title: Dare Me
plot: The lives of several cheerleaders are changed forever when a shocking crime rocks their quiet suburban world.

title: Sightless
plot: After an attack renders her blind, Ellen Ashland withdraws from the world to recover. But soon she plunges into paranoia, unable to convince anyone that her assailant has returned to terrorize her by hiding in plain sight.

title: Underworld: Evolution
plot: Picking up directly from the previous movie, vampire warrior Selene and the half werewolf Michael hunt for clues to reveal the history of their races and the war between them.

title: The Secret Life of Bees
plot: In 1964, a teenage girl in search of the truth about her mother runs away to a small town in South Carolina and finds a family of independent women who can connect her to her past.

title: A Single Man
plot: An English professor, one year after the sudden death of his boyfriend, is unable to cope with his typical days in 1960s Los Angeles.

title: The Quintessential Quintuplets
plot: A poor, straight A student is hired to tutor some rich quintuplets. The story is told as a flashback from a future that shows that he ends up getting married to one of them.

title: Lust for Life
plot: The life of brilliant but tortured artist  Vincent van Gogh .

title: P-Valley
plot: Follows the lives of strip club dancers working down in the Dirty Delta.

title: Dead Ringers
plot: Twin gynecologists take full advantage of the fact that nobody can tell them apart, until their relationship begins to deteriorate over a woman.

title: A Ghost Story
plot: In this singular exploration of legacy, love, loss, and the enormity of existence, a recently deceased, white-sheeted ghost returns to his suburban home to try to reconnect with his bereft wife.

title: 47 Meters Down: Uncaged
plot: Two sisters diving in a ruined underwater city quickly learn they've entered the territory of the deadliest shark species in the claustrophobic labyrinth of submerged caves.

title: The Boys in the Band
plot: At a birthday party in 1968 New York, a surprise guest and a drunken game leave seven gay friends reckoning with unspoken feelings and buried truths.

title: Wonder Wheel
plot: On Coney Island in the 1950s, a lifeguard tells the story of a middle-aged carousel operator, his beleaguered wife, and the visitor who turns their lives upside-down.

title: Get Shorty
plot: A mobster travels to Hollywood to collect a debt, and discovers that the movie business is much the same as his current job.

title: Cat on a Hot Tin Roof
plot: Brick is an alcoholic ex-football player who drinks his days away and resists the affections of his wife. A reunion with his terminal father jogs a host of memories and revelations for both father and son.

title: Scream 2
plot: Two years after the first series of murders, as Sidney acclimates to college life, someone donning the Ghostface costume begins a new string of killings.

title: Born a Champion
plot: Mickey Kelley, one of the first American black belts in Brazilian jiu-jitsu, gets pulled away from everything he loves and into an unsanctioned MMA tournament.

title: Breeders
plot: A comedic look at the trials and tribulations of parenthood.

title: The Last Temptation of Christ
plot: The life of  Jesus Christ , his journey through life as he faces the struggles all humans do, and his final temptation on the cross.

title: Happy Together
plot: Claire and Jake's married life is mired in routine, but when megastar Cooper shows up at their door, they get dragged into his life of fame.

title: Tall Girl
plot: Jodi, the tallest girl in her high school, has always felt uncomfortable in her own skin. But after years of slouching, being made fun of, and avoiding attention at all costs, Jodi finally decides to find the confidence to stand tall.

title: Rat Race
plot: A Las Vegas casino magnate, determined to find a new avenue for wagering, sets up a race for money.

title: A Dog's Journey
plot: A dog finds the meaning of his own existence through the lives of the humans he meets.

title: Blood & Treasure
plot: An antiquities expert teams up with an art thief to catch a terrorist who funds his attacks using stolen artifacts.

title: The Right Stuff
plot: The story of the original Mercury 7 astronauts and their macho, seat-of-the-pants approach to the space program.

title: Girls Trip
plot: When four lifelong friends travel to New Orleans for the annual Essence Festival, sisterhoods are rekindled, wild sides are rediscovered, and there's enough dancing, drinking, brawling and romancing to make the Big Easy blush.

title: The Champions
plot: Craig Stirling, Sharron Macready and Richard Barrett were agents for Nemesis, an international intelligence organisation based in Geneva. Their first mission as a team; investigate some ...                 See full summary  »

title: Sanctuary
plot: Stem cells, gene therapy, transplants, and cloning have changed the definition of "humanity" in the modern world, but the darker side contains monsters that only few are brave enough to face, because the future lies in their hands.

title: Kramer vs. Kramer
plot: Ted Kramer's wife leaves him, allowing for a lost bond to be rediscovered between Ted and his son, Billy. But a heated custody battle ensues over the divorced couple's son, deepening the wounds left by the separation.

title: Spawn
plot: An elite mercenary is killed, but comes back from Hell as a reluctant soldier of the Devil.

title: A Wrinkle in Time
plot: After the disappearance of her scientist father, three peculiar beings send Meg, her brother, and her friend to space in order to find him.

title: Fullmetal Alchemist
plot: When a failed alchemical ritual leaves brothers Edward and Alphonse Elric with severely damaged bodies, they begin searching for the one thing that can save them; the fabled philosopher's stone.

title: The Commuter
plot: An action-thriller in which an insurance salesman/ex-cop is caught up in a life-threatening conspiracy during his daily commute home.

title: Gia
plot: The story of the life of  Gia Carangi , a top fashion model from the late 1970s, from her meteoric rise to the forefront of the modeling industry, to her untimely death.

title: Mowgli: Legend of the Jungle
plot: A human child raised by wolves must face off against a menacing tiger named Shere Khan, as well as his own origins.

title: Rugrats
plot: The cartoon misadventures of four babies and their snotty older cousin as they face the things in life they don't understand.

title: Gone
plot: A woman is convinced her kidnapper has returned when her sister goes missing.

title: Assembly Required
plot: Home repair experts compete to rebuild and breathe new life into everyday household items.

title: Marley & Me
plot: A family learns important life lessons from their adorable, but naughty and neurotic dog.

title: Garfield
plot: Jon Arbuckle buys a second pet, a dog named Odie. However, Odie is then abducted and it is up to Jon's cat, Garfield, to find and rescue the canine.

title: Fauji Calling
plot: A soldier sacrifices his life during an attack. His family struggles following the attack which they've to face along with getting over their loss.
